newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Swedish purchasing managers' index 62.3 in June.
newsitem.headline: Swedish purchasing managers' index 62.3 in June.

text.p: Swedbank and I&L said on Tuesday that their Swedish purchasing managers' index rose to 62.3 in June from 61.2 in May, showing the industrial economic trend improved further.
"This confirms the positive development we have seen in the industrial cycle in the previous year," I&L and Swedbank said in a statement.
They noted that for the second month running the index was over 60.
"This indicates that the improvement in the industrial cycle is occuring at a good pace," they said.

"For the second month running this component of the index has improved considerably, although it is still too early to draw any conclusion about whether this is a long-lasting change. It is of course a positive sign."
